item.description:
Dear parishioners and friends,
 
You, your friends and family are warmly welcomed to attend St. Sarah’s Parish celebration of the Liturgy for Pentecost on Saturday evening, 11 June 2011 beginning at 5 o’clock.  
 
After our regularly scheduled mass, our friend and parishioner Dr. Peter Hagelstein will be facilitating a discussion of the book Lessons from the Light: What we can learn from the near-death experience, which can be found at Amazon.com, Biblio.com, and at many public libraries.  Refreshments will be served during our discussion group.  According to our parish custom, you are encouraged to bring something simple to share (wine, soft drinks, cheese, bread, sweets, etc.)

As always, I look forward to celebrating our community through the Sacrament, learning, and sharing.
 
Your brother,
 
Rev. Donald J. Donato
Rector

group.name: St. Sarah's Parish :: Gnostic Church and Discussion Group

item.name: Johannite Gnostic Liturgy & Discussion Group
